member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_PROFILE_DESC.DataSize
member.summary: The data size of the provided encoder profile value.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_ENCODER_PROFILE_DESC.pH264Profile
member.summary: A pointer to a value from the enumeration specifying an H.264 profile.
